hero.title: The Platform for Web Innovation Without Limits
hero.subtitle: Give you whole new web design experience by offering seamless integration with your favorite headless CMS and APIs, granting you limitless flexibility to build exactly what you envision.
hero.globe_title: Craft Stunning, High-Performance Websites with Ease and Speed

benefit1.title: Unleash Creativity with limitless integrations
benefit1.item1_text: Unleash your creativity without boundaries, and bring to life designs that you've never even imagined.
benefit1.item2_text: Harness the power of seamless integration with headless CMS and an array of APIs through our platform, streamlining application development and propelling your business forward at an unprecedented pace.
benefit1.item3_text: Build with an API-based system that offers flexibility without compromise, ensuring you keep pace with the ever-evolving technology landscape.

benefit2.title: Simply intuitive, Purely innovative, No code.
benefit2.item1_text: Our drag-and-drop editor brings your design to life without a single line of code, making it effortless to navigate and create. For those who desire full control, dive into the code and push the boundaries of customization.
benefit2.item2_text: Jump straight into designing with our intuitive platform. No extensive tutorials or technical background needed — start crafting immediately with ease. Curious about harnessing the power of AI for design? We're on the verge of integrating Generative AI to revolutionize your creative process.
benefit2.item3_text: See your ideas come to life in real-time. Our collaborative visual interface enables you to swiftly go live, streamlining your team's design process to be more fluid and natural.

benefit3.title: Edge ahead: Blazing Speed, Unlimited Expansion
benefit3.item1_text: Harness the latest advancements in technology to launch websites that load at record speeds, enhancing user engagement and reducing bounce rates.
benefit3.item2_text: Experience a seamless workflow with our platform's optimized performance that guarantees quick updates and maintenance, saving you time and resources.
benefit3.item3_text: Our solution's versatile architecture not only grows with your site but also spans across platforms—be it mobile, web, or IoT—ensuring a cohesive experience wherever your users are.

call_for_action.title: Shape the Future with Us
call_for_action.description: Intrigued by our ongoing development? Join our alpha program and take an active role in advancing our innovative system.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: All the tools you need
features.description: Astro is a high-performance static site builder that seamlessly integrates with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js. It allows you to build websites with ease and speed, without sacrificing on performance.
features.astro: Astro is the all-in-one web framework designed for speed. Pull your content from anywhere and deploy everywhere, all powered by your favorite UI components and libraries.
features.alpine: Alpine is a rugged, minimal tool for composing behavior directly in your markup. Think of it like jQuery for the modern web. Plop in a script tag and get going.
features.tailwind: A utility-first CSS framework packed with classes that can be composed to build any design, directly in your markup.
features.localization: An astro integration of i18next + some utility components to help you translate your astro websites!
features.light_dark_mode: Light/Dark mode based on tailwind classes
features.giscus: A comments system powered by GitHub Discussions. Let visitors leave comments and reactions on your website via GitHub!
features.decapcms: Open source content management for your Git workflow
features.articlegenerator: Use AI to generate your articles posts

newsletter.subtitle: Get notified for all updates
newsletter.privacy: We care about the protection of your data.
